normal.text: {player1}, start a story with one sentence. Going clockwise, everyone adds a sentence. First to hesitate drinks!
{player1}, give your phone to {player2}. They can send ONE text to anyone in your contacts!
Everyone vote on who's most likely to become a millionaire. {player1}, distribute drinks equal to your votes!
{player1}, do your best impression of {player2}. If the group approves, {player2} drinks!
Categories! {player1} picks a topic, then everyone names something that fits. Last person standing gives out 3 drinks!
{player1}, you're now a lie detector! Ask {player2} any question - if the group thinks they're lying, they drink!
Quick! {player1} name three things about {player2}. Drink for each wrong answer!

sexy.text: {player1}, demonstrate your best flirting technique on {player2}. Group rates it out of 10 - drink the difference!
Truth time! {player1}, what's your biggest dating red flag? Group votes if you're self-aware!
{player1} and {player2}, staring contest! First to break eye contact has to share their most awkward date story!
{player1}, recreate your ideal romantic scene with {player2}. Others guess which movie it's from!
Everyone writes their best pickup line. {player1} judges - worst one drinks!
